name: TrendLine Power
short_description:
A great partner for everyday trades, thanks to this tool you can draw a trendline and have it open trades, or close them or simply get an alert, if you prefer all at once.
Select a trendline and press the shit + T keys (or the ones you chose in the options)

params.title: Label (Magic Name)
params.content: When it opens a trade it marks it with this label

params.title: Max GAP between Bars (pips, over = disable)
params.content: If the trendline is crossed but the gap is greater than this value then all operations are disabled

params.title: Key
params.content: The key to be used in conjunction with the modifier key to display the management window

params.title: Modifier Key
params.content: The modifier key to be used in conjunction with the key to display the management window

params.title: Enabled ?
params.content: Enable notifications to a webhook, next parameters must be changed

params.title: All parameters with ...bar at the end
params.content: It means that the event is triggered at the closing of the candle above or below the trendline
